page.title: 06Recreation-Risby village
page.content: Many of the leisure facilities used the people in the area are located in the town which boasts a Sports Centre, roller skating rink, and cinema which are particularly important to young people. The public transport, however, is not good and rural residents rely heavily on private transport. In the village considerable attempts are made to make their own recreation and activities include fetes, play groups for the very young, bingo, Brownies, Guides, Cubs and Scouts, youth club, gardening, dancing, woodwork and drama clubs. The church is also very active as is the Over 60's club.
